ADT

Class DefaultWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • abstraction.AWeapon
      • ADT.DefaultWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILookable, IPrototype, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DefaultWeapon
extends AWeapon
    Class used to make an implementation of a default AWeapon
    Author:
    Fabricio Ceciliano, Carlos Esquivel, Marco Gamboa, Diego Murillo
    See Also:
    AWeapon

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultWeapon

        public DefaultWeapon()
        Creates a weapon with the default information from its parent.

      • DefaultWeapon

        public DefaultWeapon(java.lang.String name,
                     int range,
                     int damage,
                     int level,
                     int areaOfEffect,
                     int hitPerUnit,
                     java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,AAppearance> appearances,
                     int unlockLevel)
        Creates a weapon with the specified information.
        Parameters:
        name - The weapon name.
        range - The weapon use range.
        damage - The weapon damage.
        level - The weapon starting level.
        areaOfEffect - The weapon area of effect in a space unit.
        hitPerUnit - The weapon's hits per unit of time.
        appearances - Weapon's TreeMap containing the level and the corresponding string list of appearances.
        unlockLevel - The level at which weapon will be unlock.
